document.full_text: dozens of bodies littered the streets of a neighborhood in abidjan as fighting continued between government troops and the remnants of a militia loyal to the deposed leader, laurent gbagbo.
document.title: africa: ivory coast: fighting continues in abidjan
lines_and_colors: dozens of bodies littered the streets of a neighborhood in abidjan as fighting continued between government troops and the remnants of a militia loyal to the deposed leader, laurent gbagbo.
